post_summaries.description: The image is a dark, vertical shot of the night sky filled with many stars. The caption is a poem in Spanish by Gonzalo Rojas.
The image shows a night sky with stars and a mountain range silhouetted against the horizon. The post's caption is in Spanish and speaks about the universe, mountains, and finding inner peace.

The Instagram post shows a man, presumably ishtriahan, in a video. The caption mentions a "9-day fast" and thanks someone named Arnau for accompanying him on this "adventure." The hashtags include #createyourself and #horusalquimia.
The image is a screenshot of an Instagram post by "ishtriahan." The post is a video testimonial in English about completing a challenge. The hashtags #createyourself and #horusalchemy are included.

The image shows a close-up of ishtriahan, likely a screenshot from a video. The caption indicates he's on the 8th day of a fast and preparing for the last day. He seems happy with what he's accomplished during this cycle. The hashtags include #createyourself and #horusalquimia.
The image shows a man, presumably ishtriahan, in a video call or recording. He is wearing a zip-up jacket and appears to be indoors. The post caption mentions starting day 8 of a fast (ayuno).
